tool_description: Gives the data for upcoming competitive programming contests
title: Competitive Programming Contests

api_list.name: Leetcode Contests
api_list.description: Get the upcoming contests from leetcode.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://competitive-programming-contests.p.rapidapi.com/leetcode"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "competitive-programming-contests.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
